input: Blue Jays Rout AL West Leading A's, 13-5 (AP) AP - Rookie Gabe Gross hit his first career grand slam and Russ Adams hit his first major league home run, leading the Toronto Blue Jays to a 13-5 rout over the Oakland Athletics on Sunday.
Actors hit Venice despite protest Actors Al Pacino, Kate Winslet and Johnny Depp attend the Venice Film Festival despite protests.
Campbell's Soupy Results The world's biggest soup maker falls a penny short of earnings expectations.
